```{r}
temp <- naturtyper_long %>% filter(naturtype == "Naturbeitemark") %>%
  group_by(NiN_variable_code, NiN_variable_value) %>%
      summarise(Antall_lokaliteter = n(),
                Areal_km2 = round(sum(km2), 0))

temp2 <- temp %>%
  group_by(NiN_variable_code) %>%
  summarise(lokaliter = sum(Antall_lokaliteter)) %>%
  filter(lokaliter > 2)

temp3 <- temp %>%
  filter(NiN_variable_code %in% temp2$NiN_variable_code)
  
  
ggplot(temp3, aes(x = NiN_variable_value, y = Antall_lokaliteter))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity",
               fill = "#FF9933",
               colour = "grey20",
               linewidth=1.5)+
      theme_bw(base_size = 12)+
  facet_wrap(.~NiN_variable_code,
             scales = "free",
             ncol = 3)
```
